decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposal, by reason of lack of a meaningful gap between the proposed single storey extensions, would result in a total enlargement which would extend beyond an original side wall and exceed more than half the width of the original dwellinghouse. The proposal would not be within the tolerances of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, A.1(j)(iii) and (ja) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended.

Reason : 2 - The proposal, by reason of lack of a meaningful gap between the proposed single storey extensions, would result in a total enlargement which would extend beyond the rear wall of the original dwellinghouse by more than 4 metres. The proposal would not be within the tolerances of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, A.1(f)(i) and (ja) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended.
Reason : 3 - The proposal is NOT therefore a lawful development.
description:
CERTIFICATE OF LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT (PROPOSED):
Alterations and extension to roof to form rear gable; side dormers; rooflight in dormer roof; single storey side to rear extension; single storey rear extensions; single storey side infill extension; re-location, installation and blocking up of windows in side elevation; re-location of main entrance to front (demolition of front bay window)
